Uses of Package
android.test

Packages that use android.test
android.test A framework for writing Android test cases and suites. 
 

Classes in android.test used by android.test
ActivityInstrumentationTestCase
          Deprecated. new tests should be written using ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2, which provides more options for configuring the Activity under test
ActivityTestCase
          This is common code used to support Activity test cases.
AndroidTestCase
          Extend this if you need to access Resources or other things that depend on Activity Context.
AndroidTestRunner
           
AssertionFailedError
          Thrown when an assertion failed.
ClassPathPackageInfo
          The Package object doesn't allow you to iterate over the contained classes and subpackages of that package.
ClassPathPackageInfoSource
          Generate ClassPathPackageInfos by scanning apk paths.
InstrumentationTestCase
          A test case that has access to Instrumentation.
InstrumentationTestRunner
          An Instrumentation that runs various types of TestCases against an Android package (application).
IsolatedContext
          A mock context which prevents its users from talking to the rest of the device while stubbing enough methods to satify code that tries to talk to other packages.
PerformanceTestCase
          More complex interface performance for test cases.
PerformanceTestCase.Intermediates
          Callbacks for PerformanceTestCase.
TestBrowserController
           
TestBrowserView
           
TestRunner.IntermediateTime
          Listener.performance() 'intermediates' argument is a list of these.
TestRunner.Listener
          Support class that receives status on test progress.
TestSuiteProvider
          Implementors will know how to get a test suite.
